label: Homily on the Dormition of the Virgin Mary?

work.desc_title: John of Damascus, Homily on the Dormition of the Virgin Mary
creator: ark:/21198/s18c7m

note.value: The undertext appears to contain a homily on, or perhaps the narrative of, the dormition of the Virgin Mary from the Bethlehem tradition
Arabic translator: Abba Antonios or ‘Abdallah ibn al-Fadl al-Antaki?

There is a clear divergence between this undertext object and the well-known published versions (cf. Shoemaker 2002). See also, Graf, Geschichte, Vol. 1, pp. 249-251 and his references to Sinai MSS of similar content. Finally, compare Enger 1854, p. 54 with the undertext on fol. 30r

Bibliography: Stephen J. Shoemaker, Ancient Traditions of the Virgin Mary’s Dormition and Assumption. Oxford: University Press, 2002 ; Graf, Geschichte, Vol. 1, 249-251 ; Maximilian Enger, Akhbär Yühanna as-salîh fi-naqlat umm al-Masih, id est Joannis Apostoli de transitu Beatae Mariae Virginis Liber (Eberfeld: R. L. Friderichs, 1854)
